Class SlidingMover

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.moveblocks.BlockMover
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.doors.slidingdoor.SlidingMover
public class SlidingMover extends BlockMover
Represents a BlockMover for SlidingDoor.

    • prepareAnimation

      protected void prepareAnimation()
      Description copied from class: BlockMover
      This method is called right before the animation is started and spawns the animated blocks.

      Overriding methods should not forget to either call this method or spawn the animated blocks themselves.

      Overrides:
      prepareAnimation in class BlockMover
